custom-sql.sql: SELECT c.itemId, b.portfolioId, a.assetId, a.security_ticker, a.id_isin, a.name, '' as industry_sector, '' as industry_group, '' as industry_subgroup, a.current_price, c.purchasedFx, e.conversion as current_fx, b.baseCurrency, a.security_des, '' as security_typ, '' as security_typ2, a.parent_comp_name, c.purchaseQty, c.purchaseDate, '' as security_class, a.country as countryId, d.name as countryName, a.country_of_risk as countryOfRisk, a.country_of_risk as countryOfRiskName, a.currency_, (c.purchasePrice * c.purchaseQty * c.purchasedFx) as purchasedMarketValue, (a.current_price * c.purchaseQty * e.conversion) as currentMarketValue, ((a.current_price * c.purchaseQty * e.conversion) - (c.purchasePrice * c.purchaseQty * c.purchasedFx)) as gain_loss, ((a.current_price * c.purchaseQty * e.conversion) - (c.purchasePrice * c.purchaseQty * c.purchasedFx))/(c.purchasePrice * c.purchaseQty * c.purchasedFx) * 100.0 as gain_loss_percent, ((e.conversion - c.purchasedFx) * c.purchaseQty) as fx_gain_loss FROM fing_Asset a, fing_Portfolio b, fing_PortfolioItem c, Country d, fing_Currency e WHERE b.portfolioId in ([$PORTFOLIO_IDS$]) and a.assetId = c.assetId and b.portfolioId = c.portfolioId and a.country = d.countryId and a.currency_ = e.currencyCode
